Articles.Content:
Introducing, the Aurora 2! This rocket was a big one. It features a core stage powered by the “Vector” engine, two liquid fuel boosters powered by a “Reliant” Engine on each side and a super-efficient upper stage powered by a single “cheetah” engine. A relay satellite, which was can be sent to the Mun or Minmus, is featured in this file. Replacing it with a lander or a rover will be fine. You can also switch it with a space station or a capsule to LKO. You can change the shape of the fairing to adapt for different missions. If you are sending crew, just replace the satellite in the fairing with the capsule and cover the capsule with  a rebuilt fairing. Feel free to tweak the rocket for your custom payload. Anyways, it’s a capable rocket design. You can download it here.

Edited February 12, 2022 by Smart Boy
HERE WE GO! Aurora 2 is now available. There is no Crew or cargo differences because both of them are the same with the fairing.
